ygData.subject: I can't start Heritrix from an app anymore
ygData.msgSnippet: ... this was ... Thank you for your answer! I just downloaded today d HEAD from the continuous build box, i added all the JAR from the archive to my classpath,

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "Kristinn Sigurdsson"
<kris@a...> wrote:
> You'll need to have a recent version (current HEAD preferably) as
this was
> recently added. 
>  
> You can access the HttpMethod object via the CrawlURIs AList
>  
> > HttpMethod method = curi.getObject(A_HTTP_TRANSACTION) 
>  
Thank you for your answer!

I just downloaded today'd HEAD from the continuous build box, 
i added all the JAR from the archive to my classpath, 
I have created an order file and a seed.txt using the web interface,
ant i have tryed to run my heritrix launcher, but now, the crawls
finishes normally after only a few seconds. 

This is very strange:

- My simple Heritrix launcher used to work well with Heritrix 1.2
- I have used an order file and a seeds.txt that work perfectly when i
use the web interface
- I have looked into Hertrix code, and it seems Heritrix stopped
because there was no more URLs to crawl (it seems a call to
Frontier.isEmpty() returned true)
- I have not used my Processor class. the only write-processor I use
is the MirrorWriterProcessor (which doesen't mirror anything, since
the crawl "finishes normally" before it can get any page)

I just don't understant what is happening :(
